channel.title: Sous Vide on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti
channel.description: Recent content in Sous Vide on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: Vellum, a downtown Ann Arbor restaurant, has closed
item.description: Vellum closed in January 2015. The Ann Arbor News story tells the part of the story of an innovative kitchen that was "like a laboratory", and a subsequent format change to a more mainstream menu. The restaurant had a two year run. What's missing from the narrative is the prompt from the county health department that forced the change. Vellum's menu at the outset used the "sous vide" cooking technique to produce its most innovative dishes.
